db:abstract.db:para: A Qt Quick application that implements the Calculator example presented in the SCXML Specification.

db:article.db:para: Calculator uses Qt SCXML to implement the Calculator Example presented in the SCXML Specification.
The state machine is specified in the statemachine.scxml file and compiled into the CalculatorStateMachine class. The user interface is created using Qt Quick.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
